text: ao mnoussa lok. chaur puok anak kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa puok anak ning khlach thngai muoy del aupouk min ach chuoy kaun robsa ke haey kaun min ach chuoy avei dl aupouk robsa ke ban . pitabrakd nasa karosanyea robsa a l laoh kuchea karpit . dau che neah chaur komaoy chivit lokey baok brasa puok anak ning komaoy puok baokabrasa( shai tn chin ning mnoussa) baokabrasa puok anak brachheang nung a l laoh aoy saoh
